title: MAS RCS Form
description: MAS Request for Consulting Assistance form.

options.label: Do not add to email list
Do not add to email list

defn.help_pre:
What assistance are you
looking for at this time?  Please
be as specific as you can about the nature of this project  so we can find the right consultant to help
you.
defn.label: Details
Board Approval
defn.help_pre:
Is
your board aware of this and do they support this request?

#children.#text: and then click this checkbox to confirm you

have reviewed the terms and conditions and are
                authorized to approve these conditions on behalf of your
                agency.

MAS does not charge fees for its services, but we do ask
            organizations that are financially able to do so to consider giving
            MAS a donation at the completion of a project. Donations are
            contributions toward MAS operating expenses.
If you have any issues with this form, please email

name: afformMASRCSForm
